llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The ERC721 interface requires a function 'approve(address _approved, uint256 _tokenId) external payable'.
llm_res.function: The provided contract does not implement 'approve' marked as 'payable'.

llm_res.rule: symbol function should return the symbol of the token. E.g. 'HIX'.
